title: MORSE CODE
guide:
# Morse Code: The Secret Spy Language

## 1. The Concept (ELI7)
Imagine you have a flashlight.
* If you turn it on and off **VERY FAST**, it makes a **Dot** (•). We say "Dit".
* If you keep it on for a **LITTLE LONGER** (like counting 1-2-3), it makes a **Dash** (—). We say "Dah".

Morse Code is just mixing these Dots and Dashes to spell words. It's like drumming a rhythm to talk!

**The Golden Rules:**
1. **Dah** (—) is 3 times longer than **Dit** (•).
2. Wait a little bit between letters so people don't get confused.

---

## 2. The Alphabet (EXHAUSTIVE)
Here is every single letter.
*Tip: Say the "Mnemonic" word out loud. The syllable rhythm tells you the code!*

| Letter | Code | Mnemonic (Rhythm) | Sound It Out! |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **A** | **.-** | **A**-part | di-DAH |
| **B** | **-...** | **Bo**-na-par-te | DAH-di-di-dit |
| **C** | **-.-.** | **Co**-ca-**Co**-la | DAH-di-DAH-dit |
| **D** | **-..** | **Dog**-did-it | DAH-di-dit |
| **E** | **.** | **Eh** | dit |
| **F** | **..-.** | Did-you-**Flee**-it? | di-di-DAH-dit |
| **G** | **--.** | **Good**, **Good**, boy | DAH-DAH-dit |
| **H** | **....** | Hip-pi-ty-hop | di-di-di-dit |
| **I** | **..** | **I**t-**bit** | di-dit |
| **J** | **.---** | In-**Jaws**-**Jaws**-**Jaws** | di-DAH-DAH-DAH |
| **K** | **-.-** | **Kan**-ga-**roo** | DAH-di-DAH |
| **L** | **.-..** | A-**Lo**-ho-ha | di-DAH-di-dit |
| **M** | **--** | **Mm**-**mm** (Tasty) | DAH-DAH |
| **N** | **-.** | **Nau**-ty | DAH-dit |
| **O** | **---** | **Oh**-**My**-**God** | DAH-DAH-DAH |
| **P** | **.--.** | A-**Poo**-**py**-smell | di-DAH-DAH-dit |
| **Q** | **--.-** | **God**-**Save**-the-**Queen** | DAH-DAH-di-DAH |
| **R** | **.-.** | Re-**por**-ter | di-DAH-dit |
| **S** | **...** | Si-si-si | di-di-dit |
| **T** | **-** | **Tall** | DAH |
| **U** | **..-** | U-ni-**corn** | di-di-DAH |
| **V** | **...-** | Vi-to-ri-**ous** | di-di-di-DAH |
| **W** | **.--** | The-**White**-**Whale** | di-DAH-DAH |
| **X** | **-..-** | **X**-marks-the-**spot** | DAH-di-di-DAH |
| **Y** | **-.--** | **You**-did-it-**You** | DAH-di-DAH-DAH |
| **Z** | **--..** | **Zinc**-**Zoo**-kee-per | DAH-DAH-di-dit |

---

## 3. The Numbers (0-9)
Numbers are easy! They are always 5 signals long.
It's like a pyramid:
* Start with 5 Dashes (0).
* Add Dots one by one until 5.
* Add Dashes one by one until 9.

| Number | Code | Pattern |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **0** | **-----** | All Long |
| **1** | **.----** | 1 short, 4 long |
| **2** | **..---** | 2 short, 3 long |
| **3** | **...--** | 3 short, 2 long |
| **4** | **....-** | 4 short, 1 long |
| **5** | **.....** | All Short |
| **6** | **-....** | 1 long, 4 short |
| **7** | **--...** | 2 long, 3 short |
| **8** | **---..** | 3 long, 2 short |
| **9** | **----.** | 4 long, 1 short |

---

## 4. Special Symbols (Punctuation)
Just in case you need to end a sentence.

| Symbol | Code | Mnemonic |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **.** (Period) | **.-.-.-** | **A**-**A**-**A** (AAA) |
| **,** (Comma) | **--..--** | **M**-**I**-**M** (MIM) |
| **?** (Question)| **..--..** | **I**-**M**-**I** (IMI) |
| **@** (At) | **.--.-.** | **A**-**C** (AC) |
| **SOS** (Help!) | **...---...** | Save Our Souls |
